headline: Analysts Estimate L3Harris (LHX) to Report a Decline in Earnings: What to Look Out for
summary: L3Harris (LHX) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: How Investors Are Reacting To L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Securing a $2.26 Billion Korea Defense Contract
summary: L3Harris Technologies recently secured a US$2.26 billion contract to deliver modified Bombardier Global 6500 airborne early warning and control aircraft for the Republic of Korea Air Force, in collaboration with Bombardier, Israel Aerospace Industries' ELTA Systems, and Korean Air. This cross-continental partnership signals L3Harris’s expanding influence in the Indo-Pacific region and highlights growing international demand for advanced defense technologies. Now, we'll examine how this...
